edu.uwa.aidan.robot.world
Class Robot

java.lang.Object
  edu.uwa.aidan.robot.world.Robot

public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object

A Robot is the entity that is controlled by a NeuralNetwork. It's aim is to find the Goal within the number of steps available to it. It is equipped with RangeSensor and GoalSensors which are used as the inputs to the NeuralNetwork to determine the movement behaviour. The output of the NeuralNetwork is interpreted to be the amount forward or backward the Robot should move, as well as the amount the Robot should turn left or right.

Author:
Aidan Morgan
